thread.title: Snow alert: Weather warning upgraded with risk of blizzards
thread.title_full: Snow alert: Weather warning upgraded with risk of blizzards

author: Rachel Flaherty, Elaine Edwards
title: Snow alert: Weather warning upgraded with risk of blizzards

organizations.name: irish times previous image next image met éireann

text:
Snow alert: Weather warning upgraded with risk of blizzards Heaviest snowfall expected over Ulster, Connacht and north Leinster about 5 hours ago Rachel Flaherty , Elaine Edwards 
A wind map for Ireland on Wednesday. Darker reds indicate stronger winds. Photograph: Magic Seaweed 
Falls of sleet and snow expected in many areas on Wednesday. File photograph: Dara Mac Dónaill / The Irish Times Previous Image Next Image Met Éireann has issued two new snow and ice warnings for Wednesday as the national forecaster also warns of some thunderstorms and “blizzard conditions”.
